SEARCH
Package gamestates

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
gamestates.State
gamestates.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statemethods
public class Menu extends State implements Statemethods
The Menu class represents the main menu state of the game. It handles the display of menu buttons and their interaction.

    • update

      public void update()

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      g - The graphics object to draw onto.

      public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e)
